text: Russell A. Anderson (May 28, 1942 â€“ September 15, 2020) was an American politician and attorney. He was Chief Justice of the Minnesota Supreme Court from 2006 to 2008. He was an Associate Justice of the court from September 1, 1998 until he was 2006. He was born in Bemidji, Minnesota Anderson died on September 15, 2020 at the age of 78.Former Minnesota Chief Justice Russell Anderson dies at 78 ==References== Category:1942 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Lawyers from Minnesota Category:American judges Category:Politicians from Minnesota Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians
title: Russell A. Anderson
